string.value: #b#@1012003:##k in #bHenesys#k says it is necessary that you look into the emblem on the #rOld Worn-out Paper#k. Let's talk to him.
He tells you to find #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k in order to further investigate the emblem on the #rOld Worn-out Paper#k.
#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says the emblem signifies a demon. Let's talk to her.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2000 Able to proceed to 'There Are No Treasures?!' as next quest.

Something is strange about the drawing on this #rOld Worn-Out Paper#k.
I feel something evil emanating from the emblem.

I think you should check with the person who gave you this map.
Did #b#p1072008##k in #bNautilus#k give this to you?\nThen that's not too far from here. Rush over and talk to her.
Did you forget who gave you this?

It's been a long time since I last saw you. I can see that you've grown.
Haha, well done! I see great potential in you!
So, did you solve the mysteries behind the Treasure Map I gave you? I'm curious to see what you found out about it.

So it was only this #rOld Worn-Out Paper#k and #rOld Key#k?
Let me take a good look at it...

Mmm?

Oh wait, this emblem on the paper is...!
